data.meta_site_name: Lake Shore Funeral Home & Cremation Services | Waco Texas
data.text:
James Michael Poe, 66, of Wortham, passed away Wednesday, December 24th.

Graveside Service: 1PM Friday, December 26th at Gholson Cemetery. No visitation is planned.

He was preceded in death by son, Richard Troy Poe; father, James Lester Poe; and brother, Randy Allen Poe.

Survivors include daughters,Tabatha Hargrove and husband James, Miranda Mason, Jamie Dee Ford and husband Dale; mother, Charlsie Faye Lassetter; and sisters, Sharon Ann Reid, Judy Dominguez and husband John; brother,Tony Poe and wife and Barbara; numerous nieces, nephews, cousins and other relatives, and his specials loves that called him Poppa and Grandpa.

Place of Service: Gholson Cemetery , 1345 Wildcat Lane; Waco, TX 76705

Print Obituary & Condolences
